summary: A small patch for Path of Sorcery and the Lost Grimoire by steelfeathers.
descriptionHtml:
A few months ago, I aimed to start a mage playthrough using the Path of Sorcery and Lost Grimoire of Skyrim, both by Steelfeathers, only to find the patch for the two is outdated. From what I could tell, all the patch needed was updated formlists to include the spells from LGS, so....I did that. Done without permission, if that's a faux pas then my apologies. 

This is my first real mod, just whipped it up inTES5Edit. I've been using it for about 15 hours of gameplay with no issues, but if I've made a fatal flaw then please let me know. 

[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/68587/?]Path of Sorcery[/url]

[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/60796/?]Lost Grimoire[/url]
author: mercuryt

files.name: Path of Sorcery - Lost Grimoire Patch
files.fileName: Path of Sorcery - Lost Grimoire Patch-85085-1.rar
